KeyListEntry.name: left-focus
KeyListEntry.description: Move focus to the left window

KeyListEntry.name: right-focus
KeyListEntry.description: Move focus to the right window

KeyListEntry.description: Move focus to the top window

KeyListEntry.description: Move the current window to the left

KeyListEntry.description: Move the current window to the right
